mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing the Jefferson Carnival in Cordorus from July 15 to July 24. Poster features entertainers and the dates they are performing: The Taylor Family on July 15, Mary Lou and Band on July 16, the Multi-Tones on July 17, Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys on July 19, the Brodbecks Band on July 20, the Stiffler Brothers on July 21, the Eastmen Quartet on July 22, the Swinging Country Men on July 23, and the Fannen Sisters on July 24. Poster features a woodcut of a carnival. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/42507/

subject.topic: Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
